resources.string: A mysterious figure shrouded by black mist.

Huh, why... oh, you can see me, don\'t you? That means you\'re not one of \"them\". I see you\'re not fond of all these monsters as well. Tell you what, if you\'ll help me out with a little problem, then I will offer you my assistance. Somewhere on this level you will find a beast of darkness, a _Treacherous Spirit_. Slay it, take it\'s _heart_ and come back to me. And one more thing, if you are interested in purchasing my supplies, don\'t hesitate to ask
Help me and I\'ll help you.
Excellent. Here take this potion, surely, you will find it beneficial.
This monstrous creature looks like a cloud of a living darkness. It\'s lidless eye staring at you, pulsating with each your move.
Rat is not an uncommon sight in the dungeons, but for it to dwell so deep... You can see how rat\'s whole body spasms when it moves.
A horrible beast that emerged from the rat\'s corpse bears no resemblance to a rodent or any other animal you ever saw. Enormous mouth, full of razor-sharp teeth, occupies most of it\'s body.
Gnoll-zombie has risen from the dead!
Black pulsating heart of the Treacherous Spirit.
